name: Planet Breakout 2
description: A completely free and open-source breakout clone written in C++ and Direct2D. This space-themed breakout game has unique powerups, a built-in level editor, high scores, and easy mod support to add new bricks and campaigns. Planet Breakout 2 is a sequel to the original game created in 2007, keeping true to the original 4:3 aspect ratio and delicious chunky programmer art.
